tu.note: IMPORTANT: Native transcription of the language (e.g. Dansk, Deutsch, English). IMPORTANT: "English" should not be just translated! IMPORTANT: If the rest of the xml:lang attribute is left with the value "en", it's crucial to update the one of this entry with the correct value (e.g. fr, it, zh_CN, etc.).

tuv.seg: |Additional information: AnotherSocialEconomy.com. Report issues at: support@anothersocialeconomy.com.

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all short messages

tuv.seg: |Additional information: ezToff.com. Report issues at: support@ezToff.com. ezToff.com is a member of AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all long messages

seg.p:
--
Please see our terms, privacy policy and don't forget, you can always email Support. In the meantime, thanks for buying locally with AnotherSocialEconomy.com, a member of AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all long messages

seg.p:
--
Please see our terms, privacy policy and don't forget, you can always email Support. In the meantime, thanks for booking locally with ezToff, a member of AnotherSocialEconomy.com.

tu.note: Message subject of all long messages| {demand>key}: identifier of the processed demand

tuv.seg: AnotherSocialEconomy notification about request: {demand>key}

tu.note: Message subject of all long messages| {demand>key}: identifier of the processed demand

tuv.seg: ezToff notification about request: {demand>key}

tu.note: Piece of text inserted at the end of all short pre-formatted commands

tuv.seg: |--|This command will be sent to AnotherSocialEconomy's automated command parser.
cancel demand:{demand>key} {command>footer}
close demand:{demand>key} {command>footer}
propose demand:{demand>key} qty:{demand>quantity} unit-price:? total-cost:? due-date:{demand>dueDate} tags:{demand>criteria} metadata:{demand>metadata}
cancel proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
confirm proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
decline proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}
close proposal:{proposal>key} {command>footer}

FYI. Can you supply {demand>key} tags:{demand>criteria} {demand>hashTags} metadata:{demand>metadata} players:{demand>quantity} tee-time:{demand>dueDate}?| If yes then replace the "?" and send the following: 'propose demand:{demand>key} tags:? metadata:{demand>metadata} round-price:? total-cost:? tee-time:{demand>dueDate}'.

tuv.seg: :-) Hi {demand>owner>name}. Thank you for confirming proposal:{proposal>key} for demand:{demand>key} | The store:{store>key} {store>name} will be asked to mark and hold demand:{demand>key}.

:-) Hi {demand>owner>name}. Thank you for confirming proposal:{proposal>key} for tee-off request:{demand>key} | The golf course {store>name} will be asked to reserve the tee-off time {demand>dueDate}.

:-) Hi {proposal>owner>name}, proposal:{proposal>key} for request:{demand>key} has been confirmed.| Please mark, hold for Consumer with request:{demand>key} and then 'close proposal:{proposal>key}', or, 'flag proposal:{proposal>key} note:your-note-here'.

:-) Hi {proposal>owner>name}, proposal:{proposal>key} on {proposal>dueDate} has been confirmed.| Please mark, schedule the tee-off request:{demand>key} and then 'close proposal:{proposal>key}', or, 'flag proposal:{proposal>key} note:your-note-here'.

tuv.seg:
Hi {0},
The reservation under ezToff Proposal# {9} has been closed. We'll be updating your Rating shortly.
If you enjoyed using ezToff, please recommend us to your fellow golfers, or, simply CC them next time. {22}
Reference#: {1}.
